E-Mail Messages
Date: Wednesday, 5/1/1973
Subject: Progress of Jim Sundberg
Dear Sir,
Jim Sundberg has nothing more to prove at A Miami Orioles!
He has an AVG of .318 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/1/1973
Subject: Progress of Jack Clark
Dear Sir,
Jack Clark has an AVG of .327 at A Miami Orioles!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/1/1973
Subject: Progress of Wayne Garland
Dear Sir,
Wayne Garland is doing pretty good at AA Asheville Orioles!
He has an ERA of 3.98, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/1/1973
Subject: Progress of John Wathan
Dear Sir,
John Wathan is hitting the ball well at AA Asheville Orioles!
He has an AVG of .310, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
